name: poc-stress-test
description: Scripts to set up and tear down the Kubernetes cluster for the POC Stress Test project.

scripts.delete-infra: echo 'Excluindo Deployments, StatefulSets e DaemonSets...' && kubectl delete deployments --all && kubectl delete statefulsets --all && kubectl delete daemonsets --all && echo 'Excluindo Services...' && kubectl delete services --all && echo 'Excluindo Persistent Volume Claims...' && kubectl delete pvc --all && echo 'Excluindo ConfigMaps e Secrets...' && kubectl delete configmaps --all && kubectl delete secrets --all && echo 'Excluindo Horizontal Pod Autoscalers...' && kubectl delete hpa --all && echo 'Excluindo Jobs e CronJobs...' && kubectl delete jobs --all && kubectl delete cronjobs --all && echo 'Excluindo Pods...' && kubectl delete pods --all && kubectl delete pv --all
